headline: KKR Executives Foresee Only a Mild Tariffs Hit to Portfolio Companies
summary: Executives of KKR & Co. believe President Trump’s tariffs will have little effect on its portfolio companies, and promised to maintain an emphasis on Asia despite a looming trade war that has rattled the region.
